content: I am sorry to hear that your friend has been diagnosed with multiple myeloma. it's understandable that it must be a difficult time for them and their loved ones. but it's great to know that there are many treatment options available to help manage and treat the disease, and many more that are currently being tested in clinical trials. the important thing is to stay hopeful and optimistic and to work closely with your healthcare team to find the best treatment plan for your friend's individual needs.
